Reference

All functions

add_distance_columns()

Add distance columns to injury tables

add_ghost_trips()

Add trips taken by no one

add_trips()

Add trips to trip set

add_walk_trips()

Add pedestrian trips to trip set

ap_dose_response_curve()

Computes RR as a DR relationship

assign_age_groups()

Assign age groups to individuals

beta_pointiness()

Parametrise confidence in PA data

combined_rr_ap_pa()

Combine relative risks from AP and PA

combine_health_and_pif()

Combine health and PIF

complete_trip_distance_duration()

Data harmonisation: add columns to trip set if missing

compute_evppi()

Compute evppi, designed to be run in parallel

create_all_scenarios()

Creates specific scenarios for Accra and Sao Paulo

create_cycle_scenarios()

Creates cycling scenarios

create_max_mode_share_scenarios()

Create scenarios defined by maximum mode share

create_scenario()

Create individual scenario

create_synth_pop()

Creates synthetic population

create_walk_scenario()

Create basic pedestrian scenario

dirichlet_pointiness()

Function for Dirichlet parameters

distances_for_injury_function()

Get distances and model for injuries module

dist_dur_tbls()

Get distances and durations

gen_ap_rr()

Get RR for diseases given AP exposure

gen_pa_rr()

Get RR for diseases given mMETs

get_all_distances()

Sequence to get distance data

get_scenario_settings()

Get values for max mode share scenario

get_synthetic_from_trips()

Generate synthetic data from trip set

health_burden()

Compute health burden

injuries_function_2()

Predict injuries

injury_death_to_yll()

Map injury death burden to YLL burden

ithim_calculation_sequence()

Cascade of computations that form the ITHIM

ithim_load_data()

Load data for model and setting

ithim_setup_baseline_scenario()

Set up baseline scenario data frame

ithim_setup_parameters()

Routine to sample or set parameters for ITHIM

ithim_uncertainty()

Sampling routine for calculating ITHIM with uncertainty

join_hb_and_injury()

Join disease health burden and injury

parallel_evppi_for_AP()

Compute AP EVPPI

PA_dose_response()

Calculate RR given PA

population_attributable_fraction()

Calculate population attributable fraction

run_ithim()

Wrapper for running ITHIM

run_ithim_setup()

Run the set up script for ITHIM

scale_trip_distances()

Scale trip distances

scenario_co2_calculations()

Calculate total CO2 exposure per mode

scenario_pm_calculations()

Calculate total AP exposure per person

set_injury_contingency()

Create contingency table from itemised list of injuries

set_vehicle_inventory()

Collate all vehicle information

summarise_ithim_inputs()

Graphical processing of input data

total_mmet()

Calculate total mMETs per person

trim_glm_object()

Reduce size of glm object

walk_to_pt_and_combine_scen()

Add walk to PT
